title: The Cat and the collector
creator_credit: Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: A film which tells a story with drawings of how an old man befriends a stray cat and learns about the nature of cats. Based on the book of the same title written and illustrated by Linda Slovach. Narrated by Emery Battis. Suitable for primary school level.
